title: Optimism distributes unclaimed tokens from first airdrop, totaling $66.7 million
description: Optimism, a leading Layer 2 network on Ethereum, has completed the direct distribution of unclaimed tokens from its first airdrop, amounting to an equivalent of $66.7 million. The airdrop initially commenced on June 1, 2022, and had successfully distributed 166 million of the nearly 215 million tokens reserved for the airdrop. However, about a quarter ... Read more
